mainText:
So so sorry to hear of Steve's passing.

My life wouldn't be the same without his extraordinary and brilliant 
contribution.

I know that he gave the very very best a human being could give.

I honour and thank him from the bottom of my heart.

My love and sympathy goes out especially to his family, and to everyone 
at Apple who knew him personally.

May his spirit rest in peace forever.

with love and sadness,
author: Vera
